document_data.caption: The king and princess of Edenvale arguing over an arranged marriage.
document_data.name: King of Edenvale
document_data.mainbody: During the time of the [[Bloodforge Wars]] ([[648 DR|648]]â€“[[657 DR]]), the '''king''' of the realm of [[Edenvale]] in the [[Utter East]] tried to arrange a marriage for his daughter, [[Roxanna of Edenvale|Roxanna]].
document_data.Home: The king of Edenvale ruled from [[Edenvale Castle]] in the [[Sempadan Forest]].

History.Bryan the Bold:
:Despite this, the king of Edenvale still plotted to marry off Roxanna regardless, but she'd come to prefer Bryan to any other match. Thus she proposed Bryan capture Edenvale Castle and seize her father's crown.

[[File:Matchmaker Mayhem Bryan 4b.jpg|thumb|right|The dejected and deposed king of Edenvale surrounded by his happy family before Edenvale Castle.]]
:Finally, Bryan wooed Roxanna, they fell in love and were wed, ruling jointly over Edenvale, much to the former king's chagrin.
History.Roxanna of Edenvale: :Maintaining her independence and defeating all comers, Roxanna succeeded her father and happily ruled alone as queen. When she got tired of royal service, she abdicated in favor of an adventuring career.

document_data.Description: The king of Edenvale had pale skin and black hair and beard. His royal regalia included a silver five-peaked crown, blue robe lined trimmed with white fur and gold, and green [[breeches]].
document_data.Relations: The king of Edenvale had at least one daughter, Roxanna. If she married Bryan, the king would gain many grandchildren and potential heirs (at least three), which  would worry neighboring kingdoms.
